title: Are you just not allowed to auto attack akali when she's in her W now?
body:
Like, at least with the old Akali W, you could complete an Auto attack if you were good enough before she went hidden again. But now it's like, the shroud is a literally zhonyas (in a sense that it's invulnerability from auto attacks) in which you can only damage akali through AoE abilities.

And for how overloaded her fucking kit is, I could give two shits what her win rate is, that's going to go up to like 53% once people start playing her the correct way. I wouldn't mind how insane her damage was, if her Q didn't give movement speed along with everything else in her kit.

Well no.  She would q, disappear, auto.

Now she Qs, disappears, autos.

Its just less instantaneous since she has to run through the ring first.

before she fires Q becomes revealed, the Q hits you, she becomes revealed, she autos you, she becomes revealed, autos a second time for bonus damage passive. now she uses Q and becomes revealed, autos and becomes revealed. 

about 2 sec visibility vs 1 sec.

Umm no.

She would throw her Q.  She would be revealed for the animation, then disappear.  In total around .8 to 1.0 seconds.  Then she would auto you to proc the mark, then diappear.  In total around .8 to 1.0 seconds

So prework, about 1.6 to 2.0 second.

Now, she Qs you, then disappears, around .8 to 1.0 seconds. 
Now she has to run through a stationary ring, this will take 1 or 2 seconds giving you a moment to reposition and get away.
Then she autos you, then disappears, around .8 to 1.0 seconds.

So rework, about 1.6 to 2.0 seconds.


The only major change is now her auto has a delay and is ranged.  Letting you reposition for counter play, but you won't be given a guaranteed counter attack since you now have to run at her if you're melee.
i'm going to go ahead and assume you have never played the new or old akali since you seem to be lacking all of the knowledge on both of them.

Akali did not have to auto you twice.  She would get her heal auto off before engaging, then have her damaging auto up to proc Q for bonus damage.

And no, her Q revealed her once, when she threw it.  And thats it.

And her ult is used to finish people off, and is generally used conpletely differently then her old one, however, generally speaking shes not going to use either while staying inside her shroud.  So it's a moot point trying to bring it up.

you are ignoring the fact that previously akalis Q basically revealed her twice and that she had to auto attack you twice to get her passive damage compared to once now, also she had 3 ult procs before compared to two currently, all this added together it used to reveal her for double the duration to full combo you.

I did my research.

Akali takes .65 seconds to retreat into stealth.

Her Q and Auto attack animations take around .2 to .4 seconds to happen.


That has not changed.

The only major change is that theres a longer pause between qing you and autoing you.  Allowing you to get away.
